meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steven Popper Cheryl Stein Dave Gramling Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #831.

td.p: Steven Popper, an economist originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Cheryl Stein, a criminal defense lawyer from Washington, D.C.
Dave Gramling, a teacher and department chairman from Chelmsford, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,800)

tr.td: ANCIENT EGYPT
CELEBRITY RELATIVES
COLD-BLODDED ANIMALS
SHAKESPEARE
"O" NO!

div.onmouseover:

(Alex: Wrong.)
(Steven: I\'m still thinking of the other category.)
(Alex: I got you. Dave or Cheryl? [beep beep beep] Who was [*}?)
(Steven: I was close.)

Dale Evans

Steven
Triple Stumper
')
